title: It won't rank me up
body: Alright, So I just won 2 out of 3 ranked games for promotions out of bronze 2. I thought since i cleared it my rank would go up to bronze 1, but it doesnt show that I am bronze 1 now.

replies.body: It seems strange that you wouldn't be promoted for winning your required games.  I took a look into this for you, and couldn't see anything out of the ordinary.  The stats that I found are a bit different than what you've described.  If you'd like some additional info or specifics, feel free to reach out to us in a [ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we'll let you know.  Otherwise, I hope that helps clear things up!
